## Meet Our Team

![](https://umbral.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/DSC00159-1-2-1-scaled.jpg)

![](https://umbral.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/aragonai-ae5d20f2-99ce-461b-bebb-de232ef55caa.jpeg)

## Conner Burton

_Umbral Chieftain_

Focuses the majority of his hours trying to make AI technology practical and digestable for businesses. (To be determined if this was a good use of time…)

## Daniel Snell

_Umbral Architect_

Blending the perfect amount of creativity with techincal prowess, Daniel pushes the tip of the spear to create new AI use cases, technology stacks, and unique user interfaces that clients love interacting with.

![](https://umbral.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/daniel-snell.jpeg)

### Ready to build your AI MVP?

Need help starting your journey? Our team is ready to answer your questions and explore how we can support your needs

[More information](https://umbral.ai/contact-us)

[Let’s get started](https://umbral.ai/contact-us)

![](https://umbral.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/umbral-light.svg)

Practical AI solutions for business workflows.

- [IBM WatsonX Assistant](https://www.ibm.com/products/watsonx-assistant)
